holidays.title: Air Max Day
holidays.description: Air Max Day celebrates one of the most iconic sneakers design in history.

holidays.title: Black Marriage Day
holidays.description: Celebrate your better half as we join couples to mark Black Marriage Day.

holidays.title: Epilepsy Awareness / Purple Day
holidays.description: Join one of the grassroots campaigns to raise awareness in your community today!

holidays.title: Good Hair Day
holidays.description: As a lady, your hair is your most valuable asset; invest in it now.

holidays.title: Independence Day of Bangladesh
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate with the beautiful people of Bangladesh!

holidays.title: Live Long and Prosper Day
holidays.description: Become a Vulcan for a day and throw up a sign to wish others well.

holidays.title: Major League Baseball Opening Day
holidays.description: Every year thousands of people call in sick so they can be in the seats when the first pitch is thrown.

holidays.title: Make Up Your Own Holiday Day
holidays.description: Make up a personalized holiday that is close to your heart.

holidays.title: Martyr's Day in Mali
holidays.description: Everything you need to know about Martyrs’ Day in Mali is here!

holidays.title: National Day of Life, Peace and Justice
holidays.description: Wondering how to celebrate this day? We’ve got some suggestions for you!

holidays.title: National Landon Day
holidays.description: Landon, a popular name for boys, is celebrated today. Spoil the Landon in your life.

holidays.title: National Nougat Day
holidays.description: The classic dessert is made with whipped egg whites, sweet honey, and roasted nuts.

holidays.title: National Wayne Day
holidays.description: Wayne, a name for a boy given in the English language, means ‘wagon builder/driver.’

holidays.title: Prince Kuhio Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate the life and accomplishments of Prince Kuhio, Hawaii’s last prince.

holidays.title: Ram Navami Day
holidays.description: Get ready to understand the story behind Ram Navami and the importance of the day.

holidays.title: Solitude Day
holidays.description: Even the most social of butterflies can benefit from time alone today.

holidays.title: Wear A Hat Day
holidays.description: We raise awareness and funds for brain-tumor research, and look good while we’re at it!

holidays.title: Brittany Banks’s Birthday
holidays.description: Beyond reality T.V, Banks is a bonafide businesswoman with great looks and a brilliant mind.

holidays.title: Danielle Bregoli’s Birthday
holidays.description: This famous American rapper is most known for being the “cash me outside” girl.

holidays.title: Diana Ross’s Birthday
holidays.description: Despite some difficulties, she has withstood the test of time as a performer.

holidays.title: Gavin Magnus’s Birthday
holidays.description: He is a fast-rising teenage sensation with millions of followers on social media.

holidays.title: Jeff Magid’s Birthday
holidays.description: Everyone loves a mystery man — and this music producer is just that!

holidays.title: Kenny Chesney’s Birthday
holidays.description: He is a renowned country music singer who has defined that genre of music.

holidays.title: Nancy Pelosi’s Birthday
holidays.description: Learn more about Democrat Nancy Pelosi who is a great human rights activist.

holidays.title: Steven Tyler’s Birthday
holidays.description: Steven Tyler, the frontman of Aerosmith, is one of America’s most recognized rock singers.
